mapper.select: select BASKET.basketId, BASKET.userId, Product.defaultImage, Product.productName, Product.price, BASKET.productId, BASKET.basketQuantity from BASKET JOIN Product ON BASKET.productId = Product.productId WHERE BASKET.userId = ( select userId from customer where loginId=#{loginId} )

INSERT INTO ORDERS (storeId, userId, productId, orderDate, pickupDate, isCompleted, orderStatus, orderQuantity, pickupType, orderAmount) VALUES
(#{order.storeId}, #{order.userId}, #{order.productId}, #{order.orderDate}, #{order.pickupDate}, #{order.isCompleted}, #{order.orderStatus}, #{order.orderQuantity}, #{order.pickupType}, #{order.orderAmount})

INSERT INTO ORDERHISTORY (ordersId, changeStatus, changeDate) VALUES
(#{orderHistory.ordersId}, #{orderHistory.changeStatus}, #{orderHistory.changeDate})

INSERT INTO basketItem (itemId, basketId, productId, defaultImage, productName, price, basketQuantity) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{basketId}, #{productId}, #{defaultImage}, #{productName}, #{price}, #{basketQuantity})
mapper.select: SELECT o.orderDate, o.ordersId, o.productId, p.defaultImage, p.productName, o.orderQuantity, o.pickupType, p.price FROM orders o JOIN product p ON o.productId = p.productId WHERE userId = #{userId} GROUP BY o.orderDATE, p.defaultImage, p.productName,o.orderQuantity,p.price,o.ordersId,o.productId,o.pickupType ORDER BY o.orderDATE DESC;

SELECT o.orderDate, o.ordersId, o.productId, p.defaultImage, p.productName, o.orderQuantity, o.pickupType, s.storeName, o.isCompleted, oh.changeDate, o.orderAmount, p.price FROM orders o JOIN product p ON o.productId = p.productId JOIN orderHistory oh ON o.ordersId = oh.ordersId JOIN store s ON o.storeId = s.storeId WHERE o.userId = #{userId} AND o.orderDate = #{orderDate}
